name: Extended Keyboard

body:
### Welcome to the Project Website of Extended Keyboard!
This is the project website for Extended Keyboard, a team course project for ELEC4010B: Mobile Embedded Systems (Spring 2014) done by LI, Wenjin (10610750) (@jj1118) and WONG, Rufus Cheuk-yin (20101989) (@rcywongaa).

### Note
The links on the left of this page will bring you to the Git project of the **phone side** client, where you may view and download the APK file and project source codes. To access the Git project of the **tablet side** client, please refer to the following:
[Download ZIP](https://github.com/ELEC4010B/ExtKeyTab/zipball/master)
[Download TAR](https://github.com/ELEC4010B/ExtKeyTab/tarball/master)
[View On GitHub](https://github.com/ELEC4010B/ExtKeyTab)
